Forties.text:
Wind
In east, cyclonic 7 to severe gale 9 becoming southwesterly 4 to 6. In west, westerly or southwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first, then backing southeasterly later.
Sea state
In east, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough. in west, moderate or rough, becoming slight or moderate later.
Weather
In east, rain then showers. In west, rain or showers.
Visibility
In east, moderate or poor, becoming good. In west, moderate or good, occasionally poor at first.
